function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Potential spread of the virus during sample collection and handling","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Testing viral enrichment process in sewage samples can pose a risk of exposure to viral contaminants.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Handling sewage samples without proper pasteurization increases the risk of exposure to live viruses.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Testing and quantifying viral titers in wastewater samples involves the risk of accidental exposure to sars-cov-2 virus.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Positive signal for sars-cov-2 in wastewater samples indicates viral presence.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Identification of sars-cov-2 genetic material in sewage poses a risk of disease transmission.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Presence of sars-cov-2 in wastewater","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High death rates in specific cities and regions","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exponential growth of cases in multiple countries","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in data formats and potential api failure","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Decreasing linear daily percent changes in confirmed cases and deaths in china.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of detailed viral surveillance at the genomic level","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of mutation and evolution of sars-cov-2","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Infection of workers in slaughterhouses","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection of live virus in seafood markets","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Traces of sars-cov-2 rna in sewage water samples","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission through respiratory droplets and airborne routes","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Survival of virus on surfaces","category":"Soil","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Elderly population at higher risk of infection and mortality due to degeneration of immunity.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased thrombotic and micro-vascular complications in severe covid-19 patients, leading to covid-19-associated coagulopathy cac","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Invasion of the central nervous system by sars-cov-2, leading to neurological complications","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Active infection of the digestive system by sars-cov-2, leading to gastrointestinal symptoms","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of sars-cov-2 infection mechanism and viral properties.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Multi-organ infection and complications caused by sars-cov-2.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in t cell apoptosis in covid-19 patients.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contaminated water or environment as a source of infection","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of vectors and their behavior leading to ineffective control measures.","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited vector control methods leading to ineffective disease control.","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on single vector control tools leading to unsustainable disease control measures.","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Environmental change, insecticide resistance, and population growth","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate vector control measures leading to the maintenance of robust disease transmission","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate development and testing of novel vector control tools","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Emergence of insecticide resistance in anopheles and aedes vectors","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shift in vector control approaches to uniform insecticide-based commodities","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Underfunding of vector control r&d and programmes","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate funding for ntds","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global financing shortfalls for malaria control and elimination","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of effective vaccines for vector-borne diseases","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate housing and lack of basic services, including water and waste management, create ideal habitats for expanding ae. aegypti populations","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of effective control methods for tsetse flies","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective vector control methods","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate coverage of itns","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High rainfall in some parts of ssa","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on insecticide-based malaria vector control leading to insecticide resistance","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insecticide and drug resistance","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ddt in vector control","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Aerial spraying resulting in concerns about the environmental impact of ddt and dieldrin","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduced infrastructures for spraying","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ddt and dieldrin in control programs","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Weak vector control and surveillance","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"}]}
